content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Mr. Abbasi. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me first emphasize that as the landlord, my goal here is to secure the highest rental price possible. Now, regarding the price discussion, please share your proposed figure for the monthly rent. If we reach an agreement that meets my target, I'll respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Otherwise, I may need to reconsider or terminate the negotiation. TERMINATE if you have not mentioned a rental price yet.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
